content:
300 Spartans vs. approx 200,000 Persians, 10,000 Persians die.

Freakin' A.



I thought it had awesome fight scenes, but the story line was on par with something I wrote in Kindergarden.


(Kindergarden are the first schooling age, for all the foreigners going "Wut de fook is kiddergarden?")~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: yeah.
content:
300 was KICK ASS. That's all I have to say. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Then again I am more inclined to like those sorts of movies.

title: Re: yeah.
content: I watched this last night. That was one brilliant movie. I was expecting it to be laughably stupid, but it was incredibly well made.

title: Re: yeah.
content:
I saw it a day or two after it came out, I think.

Not really much to say about the story, but I liked the art style and it had some catchy one-liners.

And it was a gore-fest, which is always a plus (to me, at least)."A man is the less likely to become great the more he is dominated by reason: few can achieve greatness - and none in art - if they are not dominated by illusion."
--Mr. Doctor
